assessments.status_rationale: The outcome depends on the U.S. 2-year yield change from the 2025-08-18 close to the 2025-08-26 close. Today’s news does not provide end-window closing levels, so the result cannot yet be determined.

August 2025 Core CPI will be released on 2025-09-11. No official print is available yet.
The forecast targets the PMMS reading for the week ending 2025-09-19 relative to 2025-08-15. That weekly rate is not yet published.
The event window (2025-08-21 to 2025-08-26) has not begun. No qualifying S&P 500 move can be assessed yet.
Deadline is 2025-10-31. Today’s news includes no confirmed announcements of fee increases or benefit devaluations on the specified co-branded airline cards.
